TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlDataSource extends System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl

summary.span: 表示数据绑定控件的 SQL 数据库。

span.span: Represents an SQL database to data-bound controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在本主题中：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [数据连接Data Connections](#data_connections) - [执行数据操作Performing Data Operations](#performing_data_operations) - [数据提供程序Data Provider](#data_provider) - [缓存Caching](#caching) - [其他功能Additional Features](#additional_features) - [数据源视图Data Source View](#data_source_view) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 数据源控件表示数据绑定控件 SQL 关系数据库中的数据。The data source control represents data in an SQL relational database to data-bound controls. 可以使用控件结合使用数据绑定控件从关系数据库检索数据以显示、 编辑和使用很少或没有代码在网页上的数据进行排序。You can use the control in conjunction with a data-bound control to retrieve data from a relational database and to display, edit, and sort data on a Web page with little or no code. ## 数据连接Data Connections 若要连接到数据库，必须设置属性设置为有效的连接字符串。To connect to a database, you must set the property to a valid connection string. 可以支持可连接到使用 ADO.NET 提供程序，例如任何 SQL 关系数据库`SqlClient`， `OleDb`， `Odbc`，或`OracleClient`提供程序。The can support any SQL relational database that can be connected to using an ADO.NET provider, such as the `SqlClient`, `OleDb`, `Odbc`, or `OracleClient` provider. 有关如何保护连接字符串的信息，请参阅[如何： 使用数据源控件时的安全连接字符串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/942f6dcb-d278-4bec-8403-60eede9bcd62)。For information about how to secure connection strings, see [How To: Secure Connection Strings when Using Data Source Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/942f6dcb-d278-4bec-8403-60eede9bcd62). 若要从基础数据库检索数据，设置SQL 查询的属性。To retrieve data from an underlying database, set the property with an SQL query. 如果数据库的相关联的支持存储过程，您可以设置属性设置为存储过程的名称。If the database that the is associated with supports stored procedures, you can set the property to the name of a stored procedure. 您指定的 SQL 查询也可以是参数化的查询。The SQL query that you specify can also be a parameterized query. 您可以添加关联到的参数化查询的对象集合。You can add objects that are associated with a parameterized query to the collection. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和其语法的详细信息，请参阅[使用参数筛选的数据源控件与](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88622d04-2989-484e-93fe-594cd98dcf5f)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and their syntax, see [Using Parameters with Data Source Controls for Filtering](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88622d04-2989-484e-93fe-594cd98dcf5f). 控件中检索数据时调用方法。The control retrieves data whenever the method is called. 此方法提供以编程方式访问由指定的方法属性。This method provides programmatic access to the method that is specified by property. 绑定到控件自动调用方法时其调用方法。The method is automatically called by controls that are bound to the when their method is called. 如果您设置数据绑定控件的属性，该控件自动将绑定到数据从数据源，根据需要。If you set the property of a data-bound control, the control automatically binds to data from the data source, as required. 设置`DataSourceID`属性是绑定的建议的方法数据绑定控件的控件。Setting the `DataSourceID` property is the recommended method for binding an control to a data-bound control. 或者，可以使用`DataSource`属性，但您必须显式调用数据绑定控件的方法。Alternatively, you can use the `DataSource` property, but then you must explicitly call the method of the data-bound control. 可以使用的数据绑定控件的一些示例都， ， ，和。Some examples of data-bound controls that can use are , , , and . 您可以调用以编程方式在任何时候从基础数据库检索数据的方法。You can call the method programmatically at any time to retrieve data from the underlying database. 在声明性和编程 ASP.NET 方案中，可以设置的数据绑定控件绑定到的 ID 属性控件。In declarative and programmatic ASP.NET scenarios, you can set the property of the data-bound control to the ID of the control. 你还可以分配的实例类来数据绑定控件的属性。You can also assign an instance of the class to the property of the data-bound control. 有关将数据绑定控件绑定到数据源控件的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 数据访问选项](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a5ff235e-397f-4bbe-9bfe-2720b6e7ab9d)。For more information about binding data-bound control to data source controls, see [ASP.NET Data Access Options](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a5ff235e-397f-4bbe-9bfe-2720b6e7ab9d). ## 执行数据操作Performing Data Operations 具体取决于基础数据库产品和实例的配置的功能类，可以执行数据操作，如更新、 插入和删除。Depending on the capabilities of the underlying database product and the configuration of the instance of the class, you can perform data operations, such as updates, inserts, and deletes. 若要执行这些数据操作，请设置相应的命令文本和想要执行的操作关联的任何参数。To perform these data operations, set the appropriate command text and any associated parameters for the operation that you want to perform. 例如，对于更新操作，设置属性设置为 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称，并添加任何所需的参数的集合。For example, for an update operation, set the property to an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure and add any required parameters to the collection. 执行更新时由代码显式或通过数据绑定控件自动调用方法。The update is performed when the method is called, either explicitly by your code or automatically by a data-bound control. 对于遵循相同的常规模式和操作。The same general pattern is followed for and operations. SQL 查询和命令中使用， ， ，和可以参数化属性。The SQL queries and commands that you use in the , , , and properties can be parameterized. 这意味着查询或命令可以使用占位符，而不是文本值并将占位符绑定到应用程序或用户定义的变量。This means that the query or command can use placeholders instead of literal values and bind the placeholders to application or user-defined variables. 您可以将 SQL 查询中的参数绑定到会话变量，在 Web 窗体页的查询字符串传递的值、 其他服务器控件和的详细信息的属性值。You can bind parameters in SQL queries to Session variables, values that are passed on the query string for a Web Forms page, the property values of other server controls, and more. 详细了解如何在包含的 SQL 查询中使用参数，请参阅[与筛选的数据源控件使用的参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88622d04-2989-484e-93fe-594cd98dcf5f)和[使用参数使用 SqlDataSource 控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295).For more information about how to use parameters in SQL queries with the , see [Using Parameters with Data Source Controls for Filtering](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88622d04-2989-484e-93fe-594cd98dcf5f) and [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). > [!NOTE] > 默认情况下，如果其中一个参数是`null`当您执行`Select`命令时，将返回任何数据，并会引发任何异常。By default, if one of the parameters is `null` when you execute a `Select` command, no data will be returned and no exception will be thrown. 您可以通过设置更改此行为属性设置为`false`。You can change this behavior by setting the property to `false`. ## 数据提供程序Data Provider 默认情况下控制.NET Framework 数据提供程序与 SQL Server 配合工作，但不是 Microsoft SQL Server 特定。By default, the control works with the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, but is not Microsoft SQL Server–specific. 你可以连接与托管的 ADO.NET 提供程序任何数据库产品的控件。You can connect the control with any database product for which there is a managed ADO.NET provider. 与一起使用时提供程序，可以使用任何符合 OLE DB 的数据库。When used with the provider, the can work with any OLE DB-compliant database. 与一起使用时提供程序，可以用于任何 ODBC 驱动程序和数据库，包括 IBM DB2、 MySQL 和 PostgreSQL。When used with the provider, the can be used with any ODBC driver and database, including IBM DB2, MySQL, and PostgreSQL. 与一起使用时提供程序，可以处理与 Oracle 8.1.7 数据库及更高版本。When used with the provider, the can work with Oracle 8.1.7 databases and later. 允许的提供程序的列表中注册`DbProviderFactories`的配置文件，可在 Machine.config 或 Web.config 文件中的部分。The list of allowable providers is registered in the `DbProviderFactories` section of the configuration file, either in the Machine.config or Web.config file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[选择数据使用 SqlDataSource 控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/44623286-ff5a-4148-8a3c-85c56ed545eb)。For more information, see [Selecting Data Using the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/44623286-ff5a-4148-8a3c-85c56ed545eb). ## 缓存Caching 如果显示数据页使用控件，您可以通过使用数据缓存的数据源控件的功能提高页面的性能。If you display data on your page using a control, you can increase the performance of the page by using the data caching capabilities of the data source control. 缓存可减少 Web 服务器; 上的内存为代价的数据库服务器上的处理负载在大多数情况下，这是不错的折衷方案。Caching reduces the processing load on the database servers at the expense of memory on the Web server; in most cases, this is a good trade-off. 会自动调整缓存数据时属性设置为`true`和属性设置为在缓存中存储数据的缓存项将被丢弃之前的秒数。The automatically caches data when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache entry is discarded. 此外可以指定和可选值。You can also specify a and an optional value. ## 其他功能Additional Features 提供额外功能，如以下表中列出。The provides additional capabilities, as listed in the following table. |功能Capability|要求Requirements| |----------------|------------------| |缓存Caching|设置属性设置为值，属性设置为`true`，并和根据缓存数据所需的缓存行为的属性。Set the property to the value, the property to `true`, and the and properties according to the caching behavior you want for your cached data.| |正在删除Deleting|设置属性设置为用于删除数据的 SQL 语句。Set the property to an SQL statement used to delete data. 此语句通常已参数化。This statement is typically parameterized.| |筛选Filtering|设置属性设置为值。Set the property to the value. 设置属性设置为用来筛选数据的筛选表达式时调用方法。Set the property to a filtering expression used to filter the data when the method is called.| |插入Inserting|设置属性设置为用于将数据插入 SQL 语句。Set the property to an SQL statement used to insert data. 此语句通常已参数化。This statement is typically parameterized.| |分页Paging|不受当前，但是一些数据绑定控件，如，设置时，支持分页属性设置为值。Not currently supported by the , however some data-bound controls, such as , support paging when you set the property to the value.| |选择Selecting|设置属性设置为用于检索数据的 SQL 语句。Set the property to an SQL statement used to retrieve data.| |排序Sorting|将 属性设置为 。Set the property to .| |UpdatingUpdating|设置属性设置为用于更新数据的 SQL 语句。Set the property to an SQL statement used to update data. 此语句通常已参数化。This statement is typically parameterized.| ## 数据源视图Data Source View 与所有数据源控件一样，控件所关联的数据源视图类。As with all data source controls, the control is associated with a data source view class. 控件仅有一个关联，并且始终名为`Table`。The control has only one associated , and it is always named `Table`. 任何可视化呈现控件; 它作为实现控件，以便您可以创建它以声明方式和 （可选），以使其能够参与状态管理。There is no visual rendering of the control; it is implemented as a control so that you can create it declaratively and, optionally, to allow it to participate in state management. 因此，不支持视觉特征，如由提供的那些或属性。As a result, the does not support visual features, such as the ones that are provided by the or property. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples Visual Studio Web 站点项目的源代码是可随附于本主题：[下载](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192424)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192424). 本部分包含四个代码示例：This section contains four code examples: - 第一个代码示例演示如何显示数据从 SQL Server 中控制使用声明性语法。The first code example demonstrates how to display data from SQL Server in a control using declarative syntax. - 第二个代码示例演示如何显示从符合 ODBC 的数据库中的数据控制使用声明性语法。The second code example demonstrates how to display data from an ODBC-compliant database in a control using declarative syntax. - 第三个代码示例演示如何显示和更新中的数据控件。The third code example demonstrates how to display and update data in a control. - 第四个代码示例演示如何显示和更新中的数据控件。The fourth code example demonstrates how to display and update data in a control. > [!NOTE] > 这些示例演示如何使用声明性语法进行数据访问。These examples show how to use declarative syntax for data access. 有关如何使用代码而不是标记中访问数据的信息，请参阅[访问 Visual Studio 中的数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc)。For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc). 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件以声明方式以从 SQL Server 中检索数据，并将其显示在控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control declaratively to retrieve data from SQL Server and display it in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql/CS/sql3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql/VB/sql3vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件以声明方式以从与 ODBC 兼容的数据库中检索数据，并将其显示在控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control declaratively to retrieve data from an ODBC-compliant database and display it in a control. 属性是用于 ODBC，这是.NET Framework 数据提供程序名称。The property is the name of the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC, which is . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3odbc/CS/odbc3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3odbc/VB/odbc3vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示了常见的显示和更新方案中的使用控件。The following code example demonstrates a common display and update scenario with the control. 与前面的示例 Northwind 数据库中的数据将显示在控件。As with the previous examples, data from the Northwind database is displayed in the control. 此外，由于指定属性和属性设置为`true`，可以编辑和使用任何其他代码更新记录。Additionally, because an property is specified and the property is set to `true`, you can edit and update the records with no additional code. 控件自动处理添加到参数集合并调用方法时**更新**按钮单击控件。The control automatically handles adding parameters to the collection and calls the method when the **Update** button in the control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_5sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_5sql/CS/sql5cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_5sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_5sql/VB/sql5vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示了常见的显示和更新方案中的使用和控件。The following code example demonstrates a common display and update scenario with the and controls. 控件不会自动添加到更新参数集合，也不调用方法，因此必须这样做。The control does not automatically add update parameters to the collection nor call the method, so you must do so. 更新参数以声明方式指定，并且可以添加事件处理程序来执行操作时引发事件。The update parameters are specified declaratively and you can add an event handler to perform the operation when an event is raised. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包括接受用户输入，这是潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/CS/sql8cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/VB/sql8vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL 的语法`selectCommand`取决于当前 ADO.NET 提供程序正在使用，这由属性。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax for `selectCommand` depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化查询或命令，则参数的占位符还取决于所使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供程序，这是默认提供程序类，则参数的占位符是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 但是，如果提供程序设置为或，则参数的占位符是`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or the , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[使用参数使用 SqlDataSource 控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 值可以是 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称，如果数据源支持的存储的过程。The value can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建控制使用构造函数。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control using the constructor. 该示例并不常见，控件用于不在 Web 窗体页中，但在中间层对象的实现对于业务对象只是与数据库交互。The example is unusual in that the control is being used not on a Web Forms page, but in the implementation of a middle-tier object as a simple way for a business object to interact with a database. 该示例使用存储在 Web.config 文件中的连接字符串。The example uses a connection string that is stored in the Web.config file. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/CS/northwindemployee1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/VB/northwindemployee1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL 的语法`selectCommand`取决于当前 ADO.NET 提供程序正在使用，这由`providerName`参数。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of `selectCommand` depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the `providerName` parameter. 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化查询或命令，则参数的占位符还取决于所使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供程序，这是默认提供程序类，则参数的占位符是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 但是，如果提供程序设置为或，则参数的占位符是`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or the , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[使用参数使用 SqlDataSource 控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 属性可以是 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称，如果数据源支持的存储的过程。The property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持的数据缓存。The control supports data caching. 数据被缓存，方法从缓存而不是从基础数据库检索数据。While data is cached, the method retrieves data from the cache rather than from the underlying database. 缓存过期时，方法从基础数据库中检索数据，然后再次缓存数据。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the underlying database, and then caches the data again. 控件将自动缓存数据时属性设置为`true`和属性设置为值大于 0，指示在缓存中存储数据的缓存项之前的秒数将被放弃。The control automatically caches data when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache entry is discarded. 值为 0 表示无限期的缓存。A value of 0 indicates an infinitely long cache. 持续时间的组合来确定缓存的行为和属性。The behavior of the cache is determined by a combination of the duration and the property. 如果属性设置为值，缓存上第一次数据检索操作数据、 将其在内存中的最多由指定的时间量属性。If the property is set to the value, the caches data on the first data retrieval operation, holds it in memory for, at most, the amount of time that is specified by property. 数据可能会释放之前持续时间，如果是必需的内存。The data might be released before the duration time, if the memory is required. 在下一步操作期间，然后刷新缓存。The cache is then refreshed during the next operation. 如果属性设置为值，数据源控件缓存数据在第一个数据检索操作，但会重置，该聚合包含每个后续操作的缓存的时间范围。If the property is set to the value, the data source control caches data on the first data retrieval operation, but resets the time window that it holds the cache for each subsequent operation. 缓存过期后，如果没有任何活动的时间，它等于值自上次操作。The cache expires, if there is no activity for a time that is equal to the value since the last operation. 控件可以缓存数据，仅当它处于时模式。The control can cache data only when it is in mode. 一个引发异常方法，如果控件设置为值和缓存还启用了。A exception is thrown by the method, if the control is set to the value and caching is also enabled. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当使用在 Microsoft Windows 身份验证的客户端模拟时，数据将缓存第一个用户访问数据时。When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果另一个用户请求相同的数据，从缓存检索数据。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 不可以执行另一个调用到数据库，以验证用户的访问权限的数据检索的数据。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果希望多个用户来访问数据，并且您希望每个检索到的数据库的安全配置验证的数据，不使用缓存。If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 中 Northwind 数据库检索数据并将其显示在控件，且已启用数据缓存。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database in Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control, with data caching enabled. 设置为 20 秒，因为属性设置为值默认情况下，此页的用户将看到刷新的数据每隔 20 秒。The is set to 20 seconds and, because the property is set to the value by default, users of this page will see fresh data every 20 seconds. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql/CS/sql18cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql/VB/sql18vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持的数据缓存。The control supports data caching. 数据被缓存，方法从缓存而不是从基础数据库检索数据。While data is cached, the method retrieves data from the cache rather than from the underlying database. 缓存过期时，方法从基础数据库中检索数据，然后再次缓存数据。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the underlying database, and then caches the data again. 可以设置要创建的所有高速缓存条目之间建立依赖关系属性控件和密钥。You can set the property to create a dependency between all cache entries that are created by the control and the key. 以编程方式，也可以通过使键随时终止所有缓存条目。You can programmatically expire all the cache entries at any time by expiring the key. 控件可以缓存数据时，才在模式。The control can cache data only when in the mode. 一个引发异常方法，如果控件设置为值和缓存还启用了。A exception is thrown by the method, if the control is set to the value and caching is also enabled. 为每个组合创建唯一缓存项， ，和属性。A unique cache entry is created for every combination of the , , and properties. 多个控件可以使用相同的缓存条目在方案中控件将相同的数据加载相同的基础数据库中。Multiple controls can use the same cache entries in scenarios where the controls load the same data from the same underlying database. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当使用在 Microsoft Windows 身份验证的客户端模拟时，数据将缓存第一个用户访问数据时。When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果另一个用户请求相同的数据，从缓存检索数据。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 不可以执行另一个调用到数据库，以验证用户的访问权限的数据检索的数据。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果希望多个用户来访问数据，并且您希望每个检索到的数据库的安全配置验证的数据，不使用缓存。If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定是否将旧的和新值的参数应用于`Update`方法。The property determines whether parameters for old and new values are applied to the `Update` method. 例如，如果该命令是指定属性返回对象包含列`Name`和`Number`并属性设置为值，用于创建参数`Name`并`Number`为`Update`方法。For example, if the command that is specified by the property returns a object with the columns `Name` and `Number` and the property is set to the value, parameters are created for `Name` and `Number` for the `Update` method. 如果属性设置为值，用于创建参数`Name`， `Number`， `original_Name`，并`original_Number`。If the property is set to the value, parameters are created for `Name`, `Number`, `original_Name`, and `original_Number`. (取决于原始值的参数的确切名称属性。)控件，然后确定如果`Update`中指定的方法属性具有相匹配的参数。(The exact name of the parameters for the original values depends on the property.) The control then determines if the `Update` method that is specified in the property has parameters that match. 并发控制是一种数据存储区使用的控件如何读取和在多个客户端访问和操作同一数据存储区中更改数据的技术。Concurrency control is a technique that data stores use to control how data is read and changed in the store when multiple clients are accessing and manipulating the same data. 例如，一个客户端读取数据并呈现给用户，而另一个客户端读取相同的数据，并呈现给其他用户。For example, one client reads data and presents it to a user, while another client reads the same data, and presents it to a different user. 如果两个用户更新的数据，并将其提交到数据存储，则可能会出现某种意外的结果，因为两个客户端可能会更新相同数据的不同值。If both users update the data and submit it to the data storage, some unexpected result might occur, because both clients might update different values for the same data. 这被视为冲突。This is considered a conflict. 通过设置属性设置为值，你`Update`方法然后可以比较到原始的数据源，以检测冲突并在必要时处理它们，新旧值。By setting the property to the value, your `Update` method can then compare the old and new values to the original data source to detect conflicts and handle them, as necessary. 属性委托给的属性与之关联的对象控件。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可用于多种的 ADO.NET 提供程序和用于连接到基础数据源的连接字符串的语法是特定于提供程序。The control can be used with a variety of ADO.NET providers and the syntax of the connection string that is used to connect to an underlying data source is specific to the provider. 当配置控件，设置属性设置为数据库的类型 (默认值是)，并设置属性设置为包含所需连接的信息的连接字符串到数据库。When you configure a control, you set the property to the type of database (the default is ), and you set the property to a connection string that includes information that is required in order to connect to the database. 连接字符串的内容不同，具体取决于哪种类型的数据库访问数据源控件。The contents of a connection string differ depending on what type of database the data source control is accessing. 例如，控件需要服务器名称、 数据库 （目录） 的名称和有关如何连接到 SQL Server 时，用户进行身份验证信息。For example, the control requires a server name, database (catalog) name, and information about how to authenticate the user when connecting to a SQL Server. 有关连接字符串的内容的信息，请参阅属性类，属性类属性类，或属性类。For information about the contents of connection strings, see the property for the class, property for the class, property for the class, or the property for the class. 如果您更改属性，引发事件，从而导致绑定到任何控件控件重新绑定。If you change the property, the event is raised, causing any controls that are bound to the control to rebind. > [!IMPORTANT] > 有关存储连接字符串的信息，请参阅[How To： 安全的连接字符串时使用数据源控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/942f6dcb-d278-4bec-8403-60eede9bcd62)。For information about storing a connection string, see [How To: Secure Connection Strings when Using Data Source Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/942f6dcb-d278-4bec-8403-60eede9bcd62). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何设置属性以连接到 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库和显示的结果属性中的控件。The first code example demonstrates how to set the property to connect to a Microsoft SQL Server database and display the results of the property in a control. 第二个代码示例演示一个更复杂的方案，其中控件用于显示和更新受密码保护的 Microsoft Access 数据库中的数据。The second code example demonstrates a more complex scenario, where a control is used to display and update data in a password-protected Microsoft Access database. 每种情况下， `connectionStrings` Web.config 文件的元素显示第一个后, 跟包含的 ASP.NET 页控件。In each case, the `connectionStrings` element of the Web.config file is shown first, followed by the ASP.NET page that contains the control. 下面的代码示例演示如何设置属性以连接到 SQL Server 数据库和显示的结果属性中的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to connect to a SQL Server database and display the results of the property in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql/CS/sql3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql/VB/sql3vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示了更复杂的方案与前面的代码示例，其中控件用于显示和更新访问受密码保护数据库中的数据。The following code example demonstrates a more complex scenario than the preceding code example, where a control is used to display and update data in a password-protected Access database. 因为用于访问属性设置为提供程序，和属性设置为 UNC 共享访问数据库的适当连接字符串。Because the is used with Access, the property is set to the provider, and the property is set to an appropriate connection string for a UNC-shared Access database. 一个控件显示订单发货日期。A control displays orders with shipment dates. 可以通过检查相应的复选框，然后单击更新订单**更新**按钮。You can update an order by checking the appropriate check box, and then clicking the **Update** button. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个密码以纯文本形式仅用于说明目的。This example includes a password in plain text only for illustration purposes. 在生产应用程序，应加密的连接字符串，包括密码。In a production application, connection strings that include passwords should be encrypted. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护连接信息](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/protecting-connection-information.md)。For more information, see [Protecting Connection Information](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/protecting-connection-information.md). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql/CS/sql22cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql/VB/sql22vb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql/CS/sql22cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql/VB/sql22vb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的类类可以重写方法以返回强类型化数据源视图对象。Classes that derive from the class can override the method to return strongly typed data source view objects.

span.span: Gets or sets the data retrieval mode that the control uses to fetch data.

value.span: 值之一。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据检索模式标识如何控件从基础数据库中检索数据。The data retrieval mode identifies how a control retrieves data from the underlying database. 当属性设置为值，数据加载到对象，并存储在服务器上的内存。When the property is set to the value, data is loaded into a object and stored in memory on the server. 这样可以实现用户界面控件，如，提供排序、 筛选和分页功能。This enables scenarios where user interface controls, such as , offer sorting, filtering, and paging capabilities. 当属性设置为值，数据通过对象，它是只进、 只读游标。When the property is set to the value, data is retrieved by a object, which is a forward-only, read-only cursor. 特定类型的对象依赖于最终的数据提供程序的用法，由标识属性。The specific type of the object depends on the NET data provider that the uses, which is identified by the property. 默认情况下控件使用 provider for Microsoft SQL Server ，并将数据读取器对象。By default, the control uses the provider for Microsoft SQL Server, the , and the data reader is a object. 如果您更改属性，引发事件，从而导致绑定到任何控件重新绑定。If you change the property, the event is raised, causing any controls that are bound to the to rebind. 值属性存储在视图状态。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置的属性控制对值使用的方案控件不需要排序、 分页和筛选。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property of the control to the value for a scenario with a control that requires no sorting, paging, nor filtering. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql/CS/sql1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql/VB/sql1vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 使用 SQL 字符串和 集合中的所有参数执行删除操作。

returns.span: 一个值，该值表示从基础数据库中删除的行数。

span.span: A value that represents the number of rows deleted from the underlying database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 执行删除操作之前，请方法调用以引发事件。Before the delete operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 可以处理此事件来检查参数的值并执行任何预处理之前删除操作。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before a delete operation. 在操作完成后，方法调用以引发事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 可以处理此事件来检查任何返回值和错误代码并执行所有后期处理步骤。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes and to perform any post-processing. 方法提供以编程方式访问`Delete`方法。The method is provided for programmatic access to the `Delete` method. 如果控件与数据绑定控件相关联，数据绑定控件将自动调用**删除**方法。If the control is associated with a data-bound control, the data-bound control automatically calls the **Delete** method. 方法会委托给方法与之关联的对象控件。The method delegates to the method of the object that is associated with the control. 若要执行此操作，生成对象使用文本和任何关联值，然后再执行对基础数据库。To perform the operation, the builds a object using the text and any associated values, and then executes the against the underlying database. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置文本从 Northwind 数据库中删除订单。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to delete an order from the Northwind database. 最初，从订单表中检索数据并显示在控件。Initially, data is retrieved from the Orders table and displayed in a control. 必须显式声明属性并调用方法时使用数据绑定控件，如(不同于其他控件，如和，这会自动填充参数和调用上数据源控件的方法)。You must explicitly declare the property and call the method when using data-bound controls, such as the (unlike other controls, such as and , which automatically populate the parameters and call the method on a data source control). 在此示例中，事件委托给私有`OnDelete`事件处理程序，显式调用方法的控件。In this example, the event is delegated to the private `OnDelete` event handler, which explicitly calls the method of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql/CS/sql11cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql/VB/sql11vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件从基础数据库删除数据所用的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL string that the control uses to delete data from the underlying database.

value.span: 删除数据所用的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: An SQL string that the uses to delete data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示的 SQL 查询或存储过程的名称，并由方法。The represents an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure, and is used by the method. 由于不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL，因此 SQL 字符串的语法取决于当前正在使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序，该提供程序由 属性标识。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字符串的参数化的查询或命令，该参数的语法也取决于正在使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the syntax of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供程序，这是默认提供程序类，该参数的语法是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the syntax of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 但是，如果提供程序设置为或，则参数的占位符是`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[使用参数使用 SqlDataSource 控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 属性可以是 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称，如果数据库支持的存储的过程。The property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the database supports stored procedures. 属性委托给的属性与之关联的对象控件。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 出于安全目的，属性不存储在视图状态。For security purposes, the property is not stored in view state. 因为它是可以在客户端上的视图状态的内容进行解码，将有关数据库结构的敏感信息存储在视图状态可能导致信息泄漏漏洞。Because it is possible to decode the contents of view state on the client, storing sensitive information about the database structure in view state could result in an information disclosure vulnerability. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置Northwind 数据库 Orders 表中删除一个订单的文本。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to delete an order from the Northwind database Orders table. 从订单表中检索数据并将其显示在控件。Data is retrieved from the Orders table and displayed in a control. 呈现**删除**自动按钮时属性设置为`true`。The renders a **Delete** button automatically when the property is set to `true`. 此外，当**删除**单击按钮时，控件自动填充集合并调用方法。Additionally, when the **Delete** button is clicked, the control automatically populates the collection and calls the method. 最后，此代码示例将删除数据，因为事件处理程序添加尝试进行数据库备份到磁盘之前执行操作。Finally, because this code example deletes data, an event handler is added to attempt to back up the database to disk before the operation is performed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql/CS/sql10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql/VB/sql10vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性包含的参数化的 SQL 查询集合包含任何对应的 SQL 字符串中的参数占位符的对象。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string. > [!NOTE] > 请确保没有绑定到的数据绑定控件中的控件控件具有匹配中的任何参数名称的集合。Make sure that no controls in the data-bound control that you bind to the control have names that match any parameter names in the collection. 可能会导致具有相同的名称，如绑定的字段不在 SQL 命令和"未提供参数"错误的参数。Parameters that have the same name as bound fields are excluded from the SQL command, and a "parameter was not supplied" error might result. 如果属性设置为值，将创建参数的旧的和新的数据值。If the property is set to the value, the parameters are created for both the old and new values of the data. 旧值的参数根据名为属性。The parameters for the old values are named according to the property. 具体取决于 ADO.NET 提供程序中的参数的顺序集合可能会很重要。Depending on the ADO.NET provider, the order of the parameters in the collection might be important. 和提供程序将根据参数在参数化 SQL 查询中出现的顺序集合中的参数相关联。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order in which the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供程序，这是默认的 ADO.NET 提供程序为控件，将集合中的参数匹配的参数名称的 SQL 查询中的占位符 with 相关联。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with the placeholder in the SQL query. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[使用参数使用 SqlDataSource 控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 属性检索所包含的属性与之关联的对象控件。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入参数而无需验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置文本从 Northwind 数据库中删除订单。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to delete an order from the Northwind database. 最初，从订单表中检索数据并显示在控件。Initially, data is retrieved from the Orders table and displayed in a control. 必须显式声明属性并调用方法时使用数据绑定控件，如(不同于其他控件，如和，这会自动填充的参数和调用上数据源控件)。You must explicitly declare property and call the method when using data-bound controls, such as (unlike other controls, such as and , which automatically populate the parameters and call on a data source control). 在此示例中，事件委托给私有`OnDelete`事件处理程序，显式调用方法的控件。In this example, the event is delegated to the private `OnDelete` event handler, which explicitly calls the method of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql/CS/sql11cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql/VB/sql11vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 执行删除操作前发生。

span.span: Occurs before a delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件来执行特定于应用程序，以验证参数的值或更改之前的参数值的附加的初始化操作控件执行删除操作。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the delete operation. 与基础数据源的连接尚未打开，调用事件处理程序委托时。The connection to the underlying data source is not yet open when the event handler delegate is called. 因此，不能直接通过调用取消该操作方法对象，它公开由对象。Therefore, you cannot cancel the operation directly by calling the method on the object that is exposed by the object. 但是，可以通过设置来取消数据库操作的属性对象传递给`true`。You can, however, cancel the database operation by setting the property of the object to `true`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理之前，将引发的事件执行操作。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event that is raised before a operation occurs. 因为此示例从 Northwind 数据库中，将删除数据添加处理程序，以尝试进行数据库备份到磁盘之前执行操作。Because this example deletes data from the Northwind database, an handler is added to attempt to back up the database to disk before the operation is performed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql/CS/sql10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql/VB/sql10vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持的数据缓存。The control supports data caching. 数据被缓存，方法从缓存而不是从基础数据库检索数据。While data is cached, the method retrieves data from the cache rather than from the underlying database. 缓存过期时，方法从基础数据库中检索数据，然后再次缓存数据。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the underlying database, and then caches the data again. 控件将自动缓存数据时属性设置为`true`和属性设置为值大于 0，表示缓存将数据存储在检索之前的秒数新组。The control automatically caches data when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before retrieving a fresh set. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当使用在 Microsoft Windows 身份验证的客户端模拟时，数据将缓存第一个用户访问数据时。When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果另一个用户请求相同的数据，从缓存检索数据。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 不可以执行另一个调用到数据库，以验证用户的访问权限的数据检索的数据。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果希望多个用户来访问数据，并且您希望每个检索到的数据库的安全配置验证的数据，不使用缓存。If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 中 Northwind 数据库检索数据并将其显示在控件，且已启用数据缓存。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database in Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control, with data caching enabled. 属性设置为`true`和设置为 20 秒。The property is set to `true` and the is set to 20 seconds. 因为属性设置为字段默认情况下，此页的用户将看到刷新的数据每隔 20 秒。Because the property is set to the field by default, users of this page will see fresh data every 20 seconds. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql/CS/sql18cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql/VB/sql18vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置调用 方法时应用的筛选表达式。

span.span: Gets or sets a filtering expression that is applied when the method is called.

value.span: 一个字符串，它表示使用 方法检索数据时应用的筛选表达式。

span.span: A string that represents a filtering expression applied when data is retrieved using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值是一个格式字符串表达式 (一个字符串，由处理方法)，它使用中的值字符串中包含任何替换参数的集合。The property value is a format string expression (a string that is processed by the method) that uses the values in the collection for any substitution parameters included in the string. 筛选器表达式语法是相同的语法通过接受属性，因为对其应用筛选器表达式的属性执行返回的对象方法。The filter expression syntax is the same syntax that is accepted by the property, because the filter expression is applied to the property of the object that is returned from executing the method. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 如果您将参数添加到集合中，您还可以包含格式字符串的占位符 (例如，`"{0}")`中要替换的参数值的表达式。If you add parameters to the collection, you can also include format string placeholders (for example, `"{0}")` in the expression to substitute for parameter values. 根据中的参数的索引替换占位符集合。The placeholders are replaced according to the index of the parameter in the collection. 如果中的对象集合是`null`，该对象将替换为空字符串。If an object in the collection is `null`, the object will be replaced by an empty string. 可以包括在参数属性。You can include parameters in the property. 如果参数是字符串或字符类型，将参数括在单引号内。If the parameter is a string or character type, enclose the parameter in single quotation marks. 如果参数的数值类型，则不需要，引号引起来。Quotation marks are not required, if the parameter is a numeric type. 集合中包含的参数，其计算结果中找到占位符属性。The collection contains the parameters that are evaluated for the placeholders that are found in the property. 控件支持筛选数据时，才在模式。The control supports filtering data only when in the mode. 属性委托给的属性与之关联的对象控件。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Northwind 数据库中检索数据和筛选使用其字符串和集合。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database and filter it using a string and the collection. 属性应用任何时间执行方法以检索数据。The property is applied any time the method is executed to retrieve data. 在此示例中，包含一个筛选器参数，它包含在一个占位符集合。In this example, the contains a placeholder for a filter parameter, which is contained in the collection. 此外，筛选器参数是绑定到的对象属性的控件。In addition, the filter parameter is a object that is bound to the property of the control. 因为控件具有其属性设置为`true`，为所选内容中的任何更改控制导致页面发布回服务器的信息和控件重新绑定到数据源使用新的筛选器来控制。Because the control has its property set to `true`, any change in the selection for the control causes the page to post information back to the server and the control to rebind to the data source control with the new filter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/CS/sql17cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/VB/sql17vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的参数集合相关联的中指定所有参数属性。The parameters in the collection are associated with any parameters that are specified in the property. 中指定的参数占位符属性中的参数对象的顺序来匹配集合时调用方法。The parameter placeholders that are specified in the property are matched by order to parameter objects in the collection when the method is called. 属性检索所包含的属性与之关联的对象控件。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入参数而无需验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Northwind 数据库中检索数据和筛选使用其和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database and filter it using the and properties. 的属性anytime 应用控制执行方法以检索数据。The property of the control is applied anytime the method is executed to retrieve data. 在此示例中，属性包含一个筛选器参数，它包含在一个占位符集合。In this example, the property contains a placeholder for a filter parameter, which is contained in the collection. 此外，筛选器参数是绑定到的对象属性的控件。In addition, the filter parameter is a object that is bound to the property of the control. 因为控件具有其属性设置为`true`中, 有任何更改的选择会导致页面发布回服务器的信息和控件重新绑定到的数据源控件新的筛选器。Because the control has its property set to `true`, any change in the selection causes the page to post information back to the server and the control to rebind to the data source control with the new filter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/CS/sql17cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/VB/sql17vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 执行插入操作之前，请方法调用以引发事件。Before the insert operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以处理此事件来检查参数的值并执行任何预处理之前操作。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before the operation. 若要执行插入操作，对象生成对象使用文本和任何关联属性，然后执行对基础数据库对象。To perform an insert operation, the object builds an object using the text and any associated properties, and then executes the object against the underlying database. 在操作完成后，方法调用以引发事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 可以处理此事件来检查任何返回值和错误代码并执行所有后期处理步骤。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes and to perform any post-processing. 方法提供以编程方式访问`Insert`方法。The method is provided for programmatic access to the `Insert` method. 如果控件与数据绑定控件相关联，数据绑定控件将自动调用`Insert`方法。If the control is associated with a data-bound control, the data-bound control automatically calls the `Insert` method. 方法会委托给方法与之关联的对象控件。The method delegates to the method of the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入参数而无需验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将数据插入数据库使用控件和一个简单的 Web 窗体页面。The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control and a simple Web Forms page. 数据表中的当前数据显示在控件。The current data in the Data table is displayed in the control. 您可以通过输入中的值添加新记录控件，然后单击**插入**按钮。You can add new records by entering values in the controls, and then clicking the **Insert** button. 当**插入**单击按钮时，指定的值插入到数据库，然后进行刷新。When the **Insert** button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database, and then the is refreshed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包括接受用户输入，这是潜在的安全威胁的文本框中并将值插入参数而无需验证，这也是潜在的安全威胁。This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat and values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is also a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). > [!NOTE] > 此示例演示如何使用声明性语法进行数据访问。This example shows how to use declarative syntax for data access. 有关如何使用代码而不是标记中访问数据的信息，请参阅[访问 Visual Studio 中的数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc)。For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/CS/sql24cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/VB/sql24vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示的 SQL 查询或存储过程的名称，并由方法。The represents either an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure, and is used by the method. 由于不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL，因此 SQL 字符串的语法取决于当前正在使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序，该提供程序由 属性标识。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化查询或命令，则参数的占位符还取决于所使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供程序，这是默认提供程序类，则参数的占位符是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 但是，如果提供程序设置为或，则参数的占位符是`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[使用参数使用 SqlDataSource 控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 可以是 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称如果数据源支持的存储的过程。The can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. 此属性会委托给的属性相关联控件。This property delegates to the property of the that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 出于安全目的，不存储属性的视图状态。For security purposes, the property is not stored is view state. 因为它是可以在客户端上的视图状态的内容进行解码，将有关数据库结构的敏感信息存储在视图状态可能导致信息泄漏漏洞。Because it is possible to decode the contents of view state on the client, storing sensitive information about the database structure in view state could result in an information disclosure vulnerability. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入参数而无需验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何将数据插入数据库使用控件和一个简单的 Web 窗体页面。The first code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control and a simple Web Forms page. 第二个代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 中检索数据并将其显示在控件以及如何使用控件以查看详细信息到所选行的控件和窗体以插入新记录。The second code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control and how to use a control to see details of a selected row into the control and as a form to insert new records. > [!NOTE] > 这些示例演示如何使用声明性语法进行数据访问。These examples show how to use declarative syntax for data access. 有关如何使用代码而不是标记中访问数据的信息，请参阅[访问 Visual Studio 中的数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc)。For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc). 下面的代码示例演示如何将数据插入数据库使用控件和一个简单的 Web 窗体页面。The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control and a simple Web Forms page. 数据表中的当前数据显示在控件。The current data in the Data table is displayed in the control. 您可以通过输入值到添加新记录控件，然后单击**插入**按钮。You can add new records by entering values into the controls, and then clicking the **Insert** button. 当**插入**单击按钮时，指定的值插入到数据库，并刷新控件。When the **Insert** button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database, and the control is refreshed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁，并将值插入参数而无需验证，这也是潜在的安全威胁。This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat, and values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is also a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/CS/sql24cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/VB/sql24vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何从 SQL Server 中检索数据并将其显示在控件以及如何使用控件以查看详细信息中所选行的控件和窗体以插入新记录。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from SQL Server and display it in a control and how to use a control to see details of a selected row in the control and as a form to insert new records. 最初，数据显示在控制和所选的行的还会显示在控件。Initially, the data is displayed in the control, and the selected row of the is also displayed in the control. 并控件使用不同的数据源控件; 与之关联的那个具有并属性，它可确保所选的行的是显示。The and controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the has the and properties, which ensures that the selected row of the is displayed. 如果您单击自动生成**插入**的按钮控件，显示不同的用户界面，用于插入新记录。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record. 该示例使用存储的过程插入记录，并返回所插入行的主键。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 插入记录，如果会自动填充集合内的值从绑定的列和调用方法。If you insert a record, the automatically populates the collection with values from the bound columns and calls the method. 可以推断出正确的参数从任何对象以及参数，以便对象时使用双向数据绑定语法的 ASP.NET。The can infer the correct parameters from any object and a parameter for the object when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used. 在此示例中，添加一个附加参数中事件处理程序来处理返回的存储过程的主键。In this example, an additional parameter is added in the event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure. 最后，数据插入到数据库后控件，事件处理程序调用以处理事件，插入行的主键的值将显示和方法控件显式调用，以刷新的数据。Finally, after data is inserted into the database by the control, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed and the method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性委托给的属性与之关联的对象控件。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库检索数据并将其显示在控件。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from a Microsoft SQL Server database and display it in a control. 它还演示了如何使用控件以查看详细信息中所选行的和为窗体以插入新记录。It also demonstrates how to use a control to see details of a selected row in the and as a form to insert new records. 控件将显示一组数据和显示特定行的详细信息。The control displays a set of data and the displays the details for a particular row. 如果您单击自动生成**插入**的按钮控件，显示不同的用户界面，用于插入新记录。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record. 该示例使用存储的过程插入记录，并返回所插入行的主键。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 在中设置的存储的过程名称属性并通过设置标识为存储过程属性设置为值。The stored procedure name is set in the property and identified as a stored procedure by setting the property to the value. 数据插入到数据库后控件，事件处理程序调用以处理事件，插入的行的主键将显示出来，和方法控件是显式调用，以刷新的数据。After data is inserted into the database by the control, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理后插入操作已完成的事件以检查的值输出参数。Handle the event to examine the values of output parameters after an insert operation has completed. 输出参数中有与事件相关联的对象。The output parameters are available from the object that is associated with the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 中检索数据并将其显示在控件以及如何使用控件以查看详细信息中所选行的和为窗体以插入新记录。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control and how to use a control to see details of a selected row in the and as a form to insert new records. > [!NOTE] > 此示例演示如何使用声明性语法进行数据访问。This example shows how to use declarative syntax for data access. 有关如何使用代码而不是标记中访问数据的信息，请参阅[访问 Visual Studio 中的数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc)。For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc). 最初，数据显示在控制和所选的行的还会显示在控件。Initially, the data is displayed in the control, and the selected row of the is also displayed in the control. 并控件使用不同的数据源控件; 与之关联的那个具有并属性，它可确保所选的行的是显示。The and controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the has the and properties, which ensures that the selected row of the is displayed. 如果您单击自动生成**插入**的按钮控件，显示不同的用户界面，用于插入新记录。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record. 该示例使用存储的过程插入记录，并返回所插入行的主键。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 插入记录，如果会自动填充集合内的值从绑定的列和调用方法。If you insert a record, the automatically populates the collection with values from the bound columns and calls the method. 可以推断出正确的参数从任何对象以及参数，以便对象时使用双向数据绑定语法的 ASP.NET。The can infer the correct parameters from any object and a parameter for the object when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used. 在此示例中，添加一个附加参数中事件处理程序来处理返回的存储过程的主键。In this example, an additional parameter is added in the event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure. 最后，数据插入到数据库后控件，事件处理程序调用以处理事件，插入的行的主键将显示出来，和方法控件显式调用，以刷新的数据。Finally, after data is inserted into the database by the control, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件来执行特定于应用程序，以验证参数的值或更改之前的参数值的附加的初始化操作控件执行插入操作。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the insert operation. 与基础数据源的连接尚未打开，调用事件处理程序委托时。The connection to the underlying data source is not yet open when the event handler delegate is called. 因此，不能直接通过调用取消该操作方法对象，它公开由属性。Therefore, you cannot cancel the operation directly by calling the method on the object that is exposed by the property. 但是，可以通过设置来取消数据库操作的属性对象传递给`true`。You can, however, cancel the database operation by setting the property of the object to `true`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 中检索数据并将其显示在控件以及如何使用控件以查看详细信息中所选行的和为窗体以插入新记录。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control and how to use a control to see details of a selected row in the and as a form to insert new records. > [!NOTE] > 此示例演示如何使用声明性语法进行数据访问。This example shows how to use declarative syntax for data access. 有关如何使用代码而不是标记中访问数据的信息，请参阅[访问 Visual Studio 中的数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc)。For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc). 最初，数据显示在控制和所选的行的还会显示在控件。Initially, the data is displayed in the control, and the selected row of the is also displayed in the control. 并控件使用不同的数据源控件; 与之关联的那个具有并属性，它可确保所选的行的是显示。The and controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the has the and properties, which ensures that the selected row of the is displayed. 如果您单击自动生成**插入**的按钮控件，显示不同的用户界面，用于插入新记录。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record. 该示例使用存储的过程插入记录，并返回所插入行的主键。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 插入记录，如果会自动填充集合内的值从绑定的列和调用方法。If you insert a record, the automatically populates the collection with values from the bound columns and calls the method. 可以推断出正确的参数从任何对象以及参数，以便使用 ASP.NET 的双向数据绑定语法时。The can infer the correct parameters from any object and a parameter for the when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used. 在此示例中，添加一个附加参数中事件处理程序来处理返回的存储过程的主键。In this example, an additional parameter is added in the event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure. 最后，数据插入到数据库后控件，事件处理程序调用以处理事件，插入的行的主键将显示出来，和`DataBind`方法控件显式调用，以刷新的数据。Finally, after data is inserted into the database by the control, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the `DataBind` method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InsertParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 从与 控件相关联的 对象获取包含 属性所使用的参数的参数集合。

span.span: Gets the parameters collection that contains the parameters that are used by the property from the object that is associated with the control.

value.span: ，它包含 属性所使用的参数。

span.span: A that contains the parameters used by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性检索所包含的属性与之关联的对象控件。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. 如果属性包含的参数化的 SQL 查询集合包含任何对应的 SQL 字符串中的参数占位符的对象。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string. 具体取决于 ADO.NET 提供程序中的参数的顺序集合可能会很重要。Depending on the ADO.NET provider, the order of the parameters in the collection might be important. 和提供程序将根据参数在参数化 SQL 查询中显示的顺序集合中的参数相关联。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order that the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供程序，这是默认的 ADO.NET 提供程序为控件，将集合中的参数关联的 SQL 查询中的占位符别名的参数名称匹配的方法。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with a placeholder alias in the SQL query. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[使用参数使用 SqlDataSource 控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入参数而无需验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将数据插入数据库使用控件和一个简单的 Web 窗体页面。The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control and a simple Web Forms page. 数据表中的当前数据显示在控件。The current data in the Data table is displayed in the control. 您可以通过输入中的值添加新记录控件，然后单击**插入**按钮。You can add new records by entering values in the controls, and then clicking the **Insert** button. 当**插入**单击按钮时，指定的值插入到数据库，并刷新控件。When the **Insert** button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database, and the control is refreshed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁，并将值插入参数而无需验证，这也是潜在的安全威胁。This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat, and values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is also a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). > [!NOTE] > 此示例演示如何使用声明性语法进行数据访问。This example shows how to use declarative syntax for data access. 有关如何使用代码而不是标记中访问数据的信息，请参阅[访问 Visual Studio 中的数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc)。For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/CS/sql24cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/VB/sql24vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个格式字符串，该字符串应用于传递给 或 方法的所有参数的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets a format string to apply to the names of any parameters that are passed to the or method.

value.span: 一个表示格式的字符串，该格式字符串应用于传递给 或 方法的所有 参数的名称。

span.span: A string that represents a format string applied to the names of any parameters passed to the or methods.

value.span: 默认值为“{0}”。

span.span: The default is "{0}".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式字符串仅应用于主关键字，例如那些由标识`DataKeyNames`属性关联的数据绑定控件，或在删除和更新方案其中属性设置为值和一系列`oldValues`传递到相应的数据方法。The format string is applied only to primary keys, such as those that are identified by the `DataKeyNames` property of the associated data-bound control, or in delete and update scenarios where the property is set to the value and a set of `oldValues` are passed to the corresponding data method. 在这种情况下，格式字符串应用于在每个参数名称`oldValues`集合。In this case, the format string is applied to each parameter name in the `oldValues` collection. 两个常见方案中，可能会更改属性如下所示：Two common scenarios where you might change the property are as follows: - 若要区分中更新旧的和新值。To differentiate between old and new values in updates. 当属性设置为值，参数对于原始的和新值添加到集合。When the property is set to the value, parameters for both the original and new values are added to the collection. 没有格式设置字符串，将为每个数据字段创建具有相同名称的两个参数。Without the formatting string, two parameters with the same name would be created for each data field. 通过更改原始值参数的名称，您可以比较到原始的数据源，以检测冲突并比较键值的数据。By changing the name of the original value parameter, you can compare the data to the original data source to detect conflicts and compare key values. - 某些可视化设计器实现原始值和密钥的特定命名的方案。Some visual designers implement a particular naming scheme for original values and keys.

summary.span: 获取或设置 .NET Framework 数据提供程序的名称， 控件使用该提供程序来连接基础数据源。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the .NET Framework data provider that the control uses to connect to an underlying data source.

value.span: 所使用的数据提供程序的名称；如果没有设置任何提供程序，则为 Microsoft SQL Server 的 ADO.NET 提供程序的名称。

span.span: The name of the data provider that the uses; otherwise, the ADO.NET provider for Microsoft SQL Server, if no provider is set.

value.span: 默认值为 Microsoft SQL Server 的 ADO.NET 提供程序的名称。

span.span: The default is the ADO.NET provider for Microsoft SQL Server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 包括以下数据提供程序：The .NET Framework includes the following data providers: - 提供程序是默认 SQL Server 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序。The provider is the default .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server. - 提供程序是用于 OLE DB.NET Framework 数据提供程序。The provider is the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB. - 提供程序是用于 ODBC 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序。The provider is the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC. - 提供程序是适用于 Oracle 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序。The provider is the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle. 属性永远不会设置为非托管 ADO.NET 提供程序的名称如`MSDAORA`。The property is never set to the name of an unmanaged ADO.NET provider, such as `MSDAORA`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[选择数据使用 SqlDataSource 控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/44623286-ff5a-4148-8a3c-85c56ed545eb)。For more information, see [Selecting Data Using the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/44623286-ff5a-4148-8a3c-85c56ed545eb). 如果您更改属性，引发事件，从而导致绑定到任何控件重新绑定。If you change the property, the event is raised, causing any controls that are bound to the to rebind. 在指定的可用提供程序列表`DbProviderFactories`子节`system.data`Machine.config 文件的部分。A list of available providers is specified in the `DbProviderFactories` subsection of the `system.data` section of the Machine.config file. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码演示了如何连接到 SQL Server 数据库使用默认.NET Framework 数据提供程序用于 SQL Server控件， 。The first code demonstrates how to connect to a SQL Server database using the default .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server for the control, the . 第二个代码示例演示如何连接到使用.NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC，ODBC 数据库。The second code example demonstrates how to connect to an ODBC database using the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC, the . 下面的代码示例演示如何连接到 SQL Server 数据库使用的默认数据提供程序控件， 。The following code example demonstrates how to connect to a SQL Server database using the default data provider for the control, the . 每当属性未显式设置，则使用默认的提供程序。Whenever the property is not explicitly set, the default provider is used. 属性是特定于提供程序。The property is provider-specific. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql/CS/sql1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql/VB/sql1vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例在功能上与前面的代码示例相同，演示如何连接到使用.NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC，ODBC 数据库。The following code example, which is functionally the same as the preceding code example, demonstrates how to connect to an ODBC database using the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC, the . 属性设置为用于连接到 ODBC 数据库 ODBC 数据源名称 (DSN) 的名称。The property is set to the name of an ODBC data source name (DSN) that is used to connect to the ODBC database. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1odbc/CS/odbc1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1odbc/VB/odbc1vb.aspx#1)]
