remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法中会自动调用页面生命周期阶段。The method is automatically called during the phase of the page life cycle. 已附加到的数据绑定控件通过调用控制通过其属性。It is called by data-bound controls that have been attached to a control through their property. 方法将返回对象如果属性设置为值。The method returns a object if the property is set to the value. 方法将返回对象如果属性设置为值。The method returns a object if the property is set to the value. 关闭对象读取数据完成。Close the object when you have finished reading the data. 之前执行操作，则方法调用以引发事件。Before the operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以处理此事件来检查参数的值并执行任何处理之前操作。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any processing before the operation. 之后操作完成后，方法调用以引发事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 可以处理此事件来检查任何返回值和错误代码并执行所有后期处理步骤。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes and to perform any post-processing. 如果属性设置为并且启用缓存，则对象将从其中检索数据并将数据保存到过程缓存操作。If the property is set to and caching is enabled, the object retrieves data from and saves data to the cache during the operation. 创建缓存，放弃或刷新基于指定的组合的缓存行为和属性。The cache is created, discarded, or refreshed based on the caching behavior that is specified by the combination of the and properties. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当使用在 Microsoft Windows 身份验证的客户端模拟时，数据将缓存第一个用户访问数据时。When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果另一个用户请求相同的数据，从缓存检索数据。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 不可以执行另一个调用到数据库，以验证用户的访问权限的数据检索的数据。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果希望多个用户来访问数据，并且您希望每个检索的数据，以在数据库的安全配置进行验证，不使用缓存。If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval of data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching. 如果属性设置为和一个指定属性、 使用任何提供计算筛选器表达式属性和生成的筛选器应用于数据的列表期间操作。If the property is set to and a property has been specified, the filter expression is evaluated with any supplied properties and the resulting filter is applied to the list of data during the operation. 方法会委托给方法与之关联的对象控件。The method delegates to the method of the object that is associated with the control. 若要执行数据检索操作，生成通过使用对象文本和任何关联值，然后再执行对基础数据库。To perform a data retrieval operation, the builds a object by using the text and any associated values, and then executes the against the underlying database. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入参数而无需验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下面的示例说明如何以编程方式调用方法，并设置值基于查询的结果。The following examples show how to programmatically call the method and set values based on the result of the query. 下面的示例显示了 Web 控件的声明性代码。The following example shows the declarative code for the Web controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select/VB/Default.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式调用方法。The following example shows how to programmatically call the method. 控件返回一个整数。The control returns an integer. 整数的值用于设置的文本控件，并确定是否显示控件。The value of the integer is used to set the text of a control and to determine whether to display a control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select/CS/Default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select/VB/Default.aspx.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件从基础数据库检索数据所用的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL string that the control uses to retrieve data from the underlying database.

value.span: 一个 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称， 使用它检索数据。

span.span: An SQL string or the name of a stored procedure that the uses to retrieve data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示一个 SQL 查询或存储过程的名称，并由方法来从 SQL Server 数据库检索数据。The property represents an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure, and is used by the method to retrieve data from a SQL Server database. 如果在选择的命令中使用星号 （\*） 以选择所有列，并且如果使用自动生成代码来执行更新或删除操作，请确保没有列包含在其名称中的空格。If you use an asterisk (\*) in the Select command to select all columns, and if you use automatic code generation to perform update or delete operations, make sure that no columns have spaces in their names. 由于不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL，因此 SQL 字符串的语法取决于当前正在使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序，该提供程序由 属性标识。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化查询或命令，则参数的占位符还取决于所使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供程序，这是默认提供程序类，则参数的占位符是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 但是，如果提供程序设置为或，则参数的占位符是`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[使用参数使用 SqlDataSource 控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 属性可以是 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称，如果数据源支持的存储的过程。The property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. 属性委托给的属性与之关联的对象控件。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 出于安全目的，不存储属性的视图状态。For security purposes, the property is not stored is view state. 因为它是可以在客户端上的视图状态的内容进行解码，将有关数据库结构的敏感信息存储在视图状态可能导致信息泄漏漏洞。Because it is possible to decode the contents of view state on the client, storing sensitive information about the database structure in view state could result in an information disclosure vulnerability. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入参数而无需验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何设置为基本的 SQL 查询，以从与 ODBC 兼容的数据库中检索数据并将其中显示的文本控件。The first code example demonstrates how to set the text to a basic SQL query to retrieve data from an ODBC-compliant database and display it in a control. 第二个代码示例演示如何设置文本为存储过程的名称和属性设置为值，以从 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库检索数据并将其显示在控件。The second code example demonstrates how to set the text to the name of a stored procedure and the property to the value to retrieve data from a Microsoft SQL Server database and display it in a control. 在这两个示例中，则无需显式调用方法通过控件附加到数据源的数据绑定控件由于属性将自动调用期间方法阶段。In both examples, there is no need to explicitly call the method because the data-bound controls that are attached to the data source control through the property will automatically call the method during the phase. 下面的代码示例演示如何设置为基本的 SQL 查询，以从与 ODBC 兼容的数据库中检索数据并将其中显示的文本控件。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to a basic SQL query to retrieve data from an ODBC-compliant database and display it in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_4odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_4odbc/CS/odbc4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_4odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_4odbc/VB/odbc4vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何设置文本为存储过程的名称和属性设置为值，以从 SQL Server 数据库检索数据并将其显示在控件。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to the name of a stored procedure and the property to the value to retrieve data from a SQL Server database and display it in a control. 属性可以是 SQL 查询或存储过程的名称，如果数据源支持的存储的过程。The property can be an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_14sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_14sql/CS/sql14cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_14sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_14sql/VB/sql14vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件以检查的值后数据检索操作完成后的输出参数。Handle the event to examine the values of output parameters after a data retrieval operation has completed. 输出参数中有与事件相关联的对象。The output parameters are available from the object that is associated with the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件来执行特定于应用程序，以验证参数的值或更改之前的参数值的附加的初始化操作控件执行选择操作。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the select operation. 选择参数是可从与事件相关联的对象。The select arguments are available from the object that is associated with the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

summary.span: 从与 控件相关联的 对象获取包含 属性所使用的参数的参数集合。

span.span: Gets the parameters collection that contains the parameters that are used by the property from the object that is associated with the control.

value.span: ，它包含 属性所使用的参数。

span.span: A that contains the parameters used by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性包含的参数化的 SQL 查询集合包含任何对应的 SQL 字符串中的参数占位符的对象。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string. 具体取决于 ADO.NET 提供程序中的参数的顺序集合可能会很重要。Depending on the ADO.NET provider, the order of the parameters in the collection might be important. 和提供程序将根据参数在参数化 SQL 查询中显示的顺序集合中的参数相关联。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order that the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供程序，这是默认的 ADO.NET 提供程序为控件，将集合中的参数关联的 SQL 查询中的占位符别名的参数名称匹配的方法。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with a placeholder alias in the SQL query. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[使用参数使用 SqlDataSource 控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 属性检索所包含的属性与之关联的对象控件。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入参数而无需验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 中 Northwind 数据库中检索数据，通过设置属性设置为 SQL 查询。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database in Microsoft SQL Server by setting the property to an SQL query. 参数化 SQL 查询和中的占位符属性匹配到添加到对象集合。The SQL query is parameterized and the placeholder in the property is matched to the object that is added to the collection. 控制哪些绑定到，充当什么的筛选器显示在控件。The control, which the is bound to, acts as a filter for what is displayed in the control. 有关其他类型的参数可以使用的信息，请参阅类概述。For information about other types of parameters you can use, see the class overview. > [!NOTE] > 因为在 WHERE 子句中，将使用参数属性中的代码示例在功能上等效于使用和属性。Because the parameter is used in a WHERE clause, the use of the property in the code example is functionally equivalent to using the and properties. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/CS/sql2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/VB/sql2vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the name of a stored procedure parameter that is used to sort retrieved data when data retrieval is performed using a stored procedure.

value.span: 在使用存储过程执行数据检索时用于排序检索数据的存储过程参数的名称。

span.span: The name of a stored procedure parameter used to sort retrieved data when data retrieval is performed using a stored procedure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 计算属性仅当 SQL 命令，它是包含属性是存储过程的名称。The property is evaluated only when the SQL command that is contained by the property is the name of a stored procedure. 在这种情况下，如果属性设置，它包含用于对存储过程的结果进行排序的参数的名称。In this case, if the property is set, it contains the name of a parameter that is used to sort the results of the stored procedure. 如果属性设置，则它将追加到前面属性。If the property is set, it is prepended to the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个用分号分隔的字符串，指示用于 Microsoft SQL Server 缓存依赖项的数据库和表。

span.span: Gets or sets a semicolon-delimited string that indicates which databases and tables to use for the Microsoft SQL Server cache dependency.

value.span: 一个字符串，指示用于 SQL Server 缓存依赖项的数据库和表。

span.span: A string that indicates which databases and tables to use for the SQL Server cache dependency.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持基于可选过期策略（数据库服务器必须配置该服务） 的数据缓存的对象。The control supports an optional expiration policy based on the object for the data cache (the service must be configured for the database server). 字符串标识数据库和表根据相同的格式由`@ Page`指令，其中字符串的第一个部分是 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库的连接字符串后, 跟冒号分隔符和最后的数据库表的名称 (例如， `"connectionstring1:table1"`)。The string identifies databases and tables according to the same format that is used by the `@ Page` directive, where the first part of the string is a connection string to a Microsoft SQL Server database, followed by a colon delimiter, and finally the name of the database table (for example, `"connectionstring1:table1"`). 如果属性依赖于多个表中，连接字符串和表名称对由分号分隔 (例如， `"connectionstring1:table1";connectionstring2:table2"`)。If the property depends on more than one table, the connection string-and-table name pairs are separated by semicolons (for example, `"connectionstring1:table1";connectionstring2:table2"`). > [!IMPORTANT] > 当使用在 Microsoft Windows 身份验证的客户端模拟时，数据将缓存第一个用户访问数据时。When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果另一个用户请求相同的数据，从缓存检索数据。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 不可以执行另一个调用到数据库，以验证用户的访问权限的数据检索的数据。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果希望多个用户来访问数据，并且您希望每个检索到的数据库的安全配置验证的数据，不使用缓存。If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 SQL Server 缓存依赖项并设置属性的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a SQL Server cache dependency and set the property of a control. 在此示例中，每隔 120 秒轮询数据库。In this example, the database is polled every 120 seconds. 如果在 Northwind Traders 雇员数据期间的表发生更改的时间，由缓存的任何数据控件并显示控件刷新由控制下一次轮询一次数据库。If the data in the Northwind Traders Employees table changes during that time, any data that is cached by the control and displayed by the control is refreshed by the control the next time the database is polled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_23sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_23sql/CS/sql23cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_23sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_23sql/VB/sql23vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写方法将标记作为控件视图状态的一部分开始对控件的跟踪并保存更改的起始点。The method is overridden to mark the starting point to begin tracking and saving changes to the control as part of the view state for the control.

returns.span: 一个值，该值表示基础数据库中被更新的行数。

span.span: A value that represents the number of rows updated in the underlying database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自动调用方法， ，和控件回发期间，如果数据已更改。The method is automatically called by the , , and controls during postback if the data has been changed. 已在其他控件中更改的数据方法显式调用在回发过程事件。For data that has been changed in other controls, the method can be explicitly called on postback during the event. 之前执行操作，则方法调用以引发事件。Before the operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以处理此事件来检查参数的值并执行任何预处理之前操作。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before an operation. 之后操作完成后，方法调用以引发事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 可以处理此事件来检查任何返回值和错误代码并执行所有后期处理步骤。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes and to perform any post-processing. 方法会委托给方法与之关联的对象控件。The method delegates to the method of the object that is associated with the control. 若要执行更新操作，生成对象使用文本和任何关联属性，然后执行对基础数据库对象。To perform an update operation, the builds a object using the text and any associated properties, and then executes the object against the underlying database. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入参数而无需验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用控件中显示数据控制和更新数据时**提交**单击按钮。The first code example demonstrates how to use a control to display data in a control and update data when the **Submit** button is clicked. 第二个代码示例演示如何显示从 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库中检索到的数据控制和更新记录使用控件。The second code example demonstrates how to display data that is retrieved from a Microsoft SQL Server database in a control and update the record using a control. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件中显示数据控制和更新数据时**提交**单击按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to display data in a control and update data when the **Submit** button is clicked. 属性设置与参数化的 SQL 语句和两个参数添加到集合。The property is set with a parameterized SQL statement, and two parameters are added to the collection. 当**提交**单击按钮时，事件处理调用方法显式。When the **Submit** button is clicked, the event is handled to call the method explicitly. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/CS/sql8cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/VB/sql8vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何显示从 SQL Server 数据库中检索到的数据控制和更新记录使用控件。The following code example demonstrates how to display data that is retrieved from a SQL Server database in a control and update the record using a control. 该示例演示如何使用对象使用时添加事务上下文控件更新数据。The example shows how you can use a object to add transaction context when using the control to update data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql/CS/sql9cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql/VB/sql9vb.aspx#1)]

member this.UpdateCommand : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件更新基础数据库中的数据所用的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL string that the control uses to update data in the underlying database.

value.span: 更新数据所用的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: An SQL string that the uses to update data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示的 SQL 查询或存储过程的名称，并由方法。The represents an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure, and is used by the method. 由于不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL，因此 SQL 字符串的语法取决于当前正在使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序，该提供程序由 属性标识。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化查询或命令，则参数的占位符还取决于所使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供程序，这是默认提供程序类，则参数的占位符是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 但是，如果提供程序设置为或，则参数的占位符是`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[使用参数使用 SqlDataSource 控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 属性可以是 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称，如果数据源支持的存储的过程。The property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. 属性委托给的属性与之关联的对象控件。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 出于安全目的，不存储属性的视图状态。For security purposes, the property is not stored is view state. 因为它是可以在客户端上的视图状态的内容进行解码，将有关数据库结构的敏感信息存储在视图状态可能导致信息泄漏漏洞。Because it is possible to decode the contents of view state on the client, storing sensitive information about the database structure in view state could result in an information disclosure vulnerability. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入参数而无需验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何设置的属性在 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库中使用的控件和更新数据控件。The first code example demonstrates how to set the property of the control and update data in a Microsoft SQL Server database using the control. 第二个代码示例演示了如何更新数据中使用 ODBC 数据库控件。The second code example demonstrates how to update data in an ODBC database using the control. 下面的代码示例演示如何设置的属性在 SQL Server 数据库中使用的控件和更新数据控件。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property of the control and update data in a SQL Server database using the control. 会自动填充集合中，推断的参数对象，并调用方法时**更新**上可编辑链接处于选中状态。The automatically populates the collection, inferring the parameters from the objects, and calls the method when the **Update** link on the editable is selected. 此示例还包括一些后续处理： 更新记录后，发送通知电子邮件消息。This example also includes some post-processing: after a record is updated, a notification email message is sent. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7sql/CS/sql7cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7sql/VB/sql7vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例在功能上等同于前面的代码示例，演示了如何更新数据中使用 ODBC 数据库控件。The following code example, which is functionally identical to the preceding code example, demonstrates how to update data in an ODBC database using the control. 设置为适用于 ODBC 的 ADO.NET 提供程序，和属性设置为 ODBC 数据源名称 (DSN) 的名称。The is set to the ADO.NET provider for ODBC, the , and the property is set to the name of an ODBC data source name (DSN). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc/CS/odbc7cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc/VB/odbc7vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理后更新操作已完成的事件以检查的值输出参数。Handle the event to examine the values of output parameters after an update operation has completed. 输出参数中有与事件相关联的对象。The output parameters are available from the object that is associated with the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示和更新数据从 ODBC 数据库中检索到控件。The following code example demonstrates how to display and update data that is retrieved from an ODBC database in a control. 已成功更新记录后，事件由一个事件处理程序，以执行后续处理步骤发送电子邮件通知的位置。After a record is successfully updated, the event is handled by an event handler to perform a post-processing step where an email notification is sent. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性包含的参数化的 SQL 查询集合包含任何对应的 SQL 字符串中的参数占位符的对象。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string. 参数名称可能会受到属性，特别是如果该名称标识为主键，如使用指定的键`DataKeyNames`属性的数据绑定控件，或在删除和更新方案其中属性设置为值和一系列`oldValues`传递到相应的数据方法。Parameter names might be affected by the property, specifically if the name identifies a primary key, such as a key specified using the `DataKeyNames` property of the data-bound control, or in delete and update scenarios where the property is set to the value and a set of `oldValues` are passed to the corresponding data method. 在这种情况下，格式字符串应用于在每个参数名称`oldValues`集合。In this case, the format string is applied to each parameter name in the `oldValues` collection. 中的参数的顺序集合可能是重要的是，具体取决于 ADO.NET 提供程序。The order of the parameters in the collection might be important, depending on the ADO.NET provider. 和提供程序将根据参数在参数化 SQL 查询中显示的顺序集合中的参数相关联。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order that the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供程序，这是默认的 ADO.NET 提供程序为控件，将集合中的参数关联的 SQL 查询中的占位符别名的参数名称匹配的方法。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with a placeholder alias in the SQL query. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[使用参数使用 SqlDataSource 控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 属性检索所包含的属性与之关联的对象控件。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入参数而无需验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件中显示数据控制和更新数据时**提交**单击按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to display data in a control and update data when the **Submit** button is clicked. 使用参数化的 SQL 语句和两个设置参数添加到集合。The is set with a parameterized SQL statement and two parameters are added to the collection. 当**提交**单击按钮时，事件处理调用方法显式。When the **Submit** button is clicked, the event is handled to call the method explicitly. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁，并将值插入参数而无需验证，这也是潜在的安全威胁。This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat, and values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is also a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more summary.span: 执行更新操作前发生。

span.span: Occurs before an update operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件来执行特定于应用程序，以验证参数的值或更改之前的参数值的附加的初始化操作控件执行更新操作。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the update operation. 与基础数据源的连接尚未打开，调用事件处理程序委托时。The connection to the underlying data source is not yet open when the event handler delegate is called. 因此，不能直接取消通过调用数据库操作方法对象，它公开由对象。Therefore, you cannot directly cancel the database operation by calling the method on the object that is exposed by the object. 但是，可以通过设置来取消数据库操作的属性到`true`。You can, however, cancel the database operation by setting the property of the to `true`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入参数而无需验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件，以便执行查询之前验证参数值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示从 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库中检索到的数据控制和更新记录使用控件。The following code example demonstrates how to display data that is retrieved from a Microsoft SQL Server database in a control and update the record using a control. 该示例演示如何使用对象使用时添加事务上下文控件更新数据。The example shows how you can use a object to add transaction context when using the control to update data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql/CS/sql9cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql/VB/sql9vb.aspx#1)]
